description: Erection of a 1st floor side wing to existing rear extension, erection of 2 dormer windows to the side and rear roofslopes and the installation of a rooflight on the front roofslope, in association with use as a single family dwelling house (Class C3).
decision_conditions:
Reason : 1 - The proposed rear 1st floor extension, by reason of its size, height and location, would cumulatively result in an excessively bulky rear extension and result in the loss of the visual gap between nos. 10 and 14 Woodsome Road, which would be harmful to the appearance of the host building, the character of the terrace of houses at nos. 2 - 10 Woodsome Road and the character of the streetscene and the Dartmouth Park Conservation Area. This is contrary to policy CS14 (Promoting high quality places and conserving our heritage) of the London Borough of Camden Local Development Framework Core Strategy and policies DP24 (Securing high quality design) and DP25 (Conserving Camden's heritage) of the London Borough of Camden Local Development Framework Development Policies.
Reason : 2 - The proposed side dormer extension, by reason of its design, size and location in an unaltered roofscape, would be harmful to the appearance of the host building, the character of the terrace of houses at nos. 2 - 10 Woodsome Road and the character of the streetscene and the Dartmouth Park Conservation Area. This is contrary to policy CS14 (Promoting high quality places and conserving our heritage) of the London Borough of Camden Local Development Framework Core Strategy and policies DP24 (Securing high quality design) and DP25 (Conserving Camden's heritage) of the London Borough of Camden Local Development Framework Development Policies.
Reason : 3 - The proposed rear dormer window, by virtue of its size and form failing to respect the alignment and design of the windows on lower floors, would be harmful to the appearance of the host building and the character of the Dartmouth Park Conservation Area. This is contrary to policy CS14 (Promoting high quality places and conserving our heritage) of the London Borough of Camden Local Development Framework Core Strategy and policies DP24 (Securing high quality design) and DP25 (Conserving Camden's heritage) of the London Borough of Camden Local Development Framework Development Policies.
